name: artist-management-system
description: 藝人經紀管理系統 - Fullstack TypeScript SideProject

scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
